titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that Peru should immediately cease any hostile activity against its indigenous peoples and instead engage in dialogue to address ongoing political conflict between state authorities and indigenous peoples.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: 6/23/2009--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that Peru should: (1) cease hostile activity against its indigenous peoples and instead engage in dialogue to address ongoing political conflict between state authorities and indigenous peoples; and (2) comply with the U.N. Declaration on the Right of Indigenous Peoples and International Labor Organization Convention 169.
